subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: While it may be years before they know if they spent wisely, the Yankees agreed on Sunday to pay $2 million to 16-year-old Jesús Montero from Venezuela.
snippet: While it may be years before they know if they spent wisely, the Yankees agreed on Sunday to pay $2 million to 16-year-old Jesús Montero from Venezuela.
